resources.string: There is a suspicion of a possible infection. Have you experienced symptoms?
At the moment there are no reports of contagion
The information exchanged via bluetooth is saved anonymously
The app automatically recognises when two users have been in close proximity for a certain time
The app operates using as little energy as possible. There is only a minor increase in battery usage.
All data is encrypted and only saved locally on the smartphone.
The app automatically recognises when two users have been in close proximity for a certain time.
It uses Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to do this. No GPS data are used.
Staying one step ahead of the virus
By using the app, we can all help to contain the spread of the new coronavirus.
The app provides information on suspected infections. In this way, the chain of infection can be broken.
The app notifies you if a potential infection is suspected.
By responding appropriately, you can protect yourself and other people.
In order to use the app, you must enable Bluetooth.
No personal data is visible via Bluetooth.
The app operates using as little energy as possible. There is only a minor increase in battery usage.
In order to receive notifications from the app, you must enable messages.
In the event of a potential infection, you will receive a message on the lock screen.
The app is ready to go
Thank you for helping to protect yourself and others.
For the app to work and for access to Bluetooth, you must enable the location function.

On Android devices, enabling Bluetooth requires you to enable the sharing of your location. This is why the location function must be enabled even if the app does not register your location at any time.
No personal data is visible via Bluetooth.
To be able to recognise encounters at all times, the battery optimisation function for this app must be disabled.
For the app to work, it must also run in the background. Battery optimisation can be disabled for individual apps, so that this is possible.
The app operates using as little energy as possible. There is only a minor increase in battery usage.
